adrFormatAddress: 475 Park Ave S #2300, New York, NY 10016-6901, USA

originalText.text: Very dissatisfied with my experience thus far.  I will be writing the president of the company a letter as well as reporting to the better business bureau.  I was rear ended by a town car insured by this company.  Can never get the same person on the telephone, and the people I have spoken to thus far do not return telephone calls that are left on their voicemails.  I was told 3 different things by 3 different employees and still have not received repayment for over $1000 that I had to pay for repairs to my vehicle (repayment request was made twice since January and the accident was in December).  Something seems very shady with this insurance company.  The reason why I gave 2 starts and not 1 is because although frustrating, the staff was courteous and they did send an appraiser to look at my vehicle promptly following the accident.

originalText.text:
Very rude. My husband got into an accident with a person covered by this insurance. They were claiming it was 50-50 at fault but then we told them we have a camera in our car, we do, they completely switch and claimed 100% fault on their driver.

Debbie snapped on the phone and screamed and yelled like nobody’s business. The woman has issues.

They give you the turnaround with everything.

They send you a check for the damage and they cancel the check before you cash it. They claimed that they were informed that we were going to go through our own insurance. Not true.

The mechanic dealing with them did not trust the insurance after the phone calls and claimed that we should pay cash because he will not trust a check sent directly to the mechanic.

I’m pretty sure this place is riddled with all kinds of illegal stuff. Terrible place.

originalText.text: We were hit by a clients of Park Insurance and it is has been a terrible time dealing with this company. I live out of state. The employees are very rude. It took me 2 weeks get the Police report from NYPD. Their client never turned in he was in a accident in the Bronx. I had to call the employer of the limo company to get the insurance company and I turned around and called Park Insurance to make sure they had coverage and the gentleman I spoke with was VERY RUDE with me. I ask how we can go from here and his comment to me was there is a thing that we have called a email. It’s not my place to make sure your client turned it in where he hit my car. I shouldn’t have to do all the leg work just to get my car fixed. Then on Monday July 23rd I get the pleasure(not) to speak with a lady who was very rude to me. I spoke to a supervisor but I’m sure nothing was said to either one of them. I live in Ga and I still haven’t got my car fixed and today is 30 days. I’m still trying to get in touch with the adjuster. I hope they fix my car and they don’t cancel my check because I am not paying to get my car fixed. It’s a brand new car and I didn’t do the damage to my car their client did I will get a attorney if I have too.

originalText.text: Whatever you do...... DO NOT do any kind or type of business with this company. They'll do anything to take your money, Swindle you out of your money. I've left Park Insurance Company back in February of this year for TLC purposes, somehow they have finagled their way into the system and still have me as their customer, for this reason TLC will not renew my vehicle license. I have been with another insurance company since March of this year signed all the proper transfer paperwork, and somehow again Park Insurance still has me as their insured. I've heard terrible things about this company and how illegal their operation is, whether it's their Russian immigration scheme that they have going on or their insurance fraud that goes on with their third party brokerage firms, it's amazing to me how this company is still in business in New York City, but wait.... they probably pay their way off to continue business here in our corrupt city of New York...

originalText.text: They saved me hundreds of dollar when I had to insure my first truck. Everyone’s experience in life will be different based on their circumstances. However, I would highly recommend PRK! And yes I’m a real person lol
